post.body: Where did you see that? Funny.
Is the wedding tomorrow?
Thanks for the heads up. Can't wait to get home and watch FOtC!
<<stomach growls>>
Ha! You called it. In my rush to run over there before starting work I forgot to put my steel-toed hiking boots on. My B.
Reds is going off for Julies bday party.
RT @calciphus: OMG!!! Flight of the Conchords Season 2 Premiere! Leaked online! IT IS AWESOME! http://is.gd/c74b
#rockingto Greatful Dead 12-30-90 and realizing it's been awhile since I've listened to GD. My bad.
Just found out the ABRES-A (Advanced Ballistic Re-Entry Systems-A) site I'm working at is where we had cold war nukes pointed at Russia. ☢
#rockingto Chinese Democracy for second listen/take and enjoying it.
Deltoids of compassion???
Dood, Dr. Horrible is cracking my shiite up. http://drhorrible.com/
#rockingto ABB "The Fox Box" bound to put you six feet in the ground!
http://twitpic.com/u1qx - Sunset at the old missile launch complex.
#rockingto Beck Guerolito. Es perfecto at this momento.
Finishing up a challenging work day. I have a good plan for tomorrow and am confident I'll figure this biatch out.
#rockingto Trey Anastasio "Plasma" ☺
Problem: setting well in mucky water. Solution: by 1000 lbs of gravel. Problem: got hurt lifting it into truck. Solution: Twitter about it
http://twitpic.com/tr7d - Historic 1960s above-ground launch gantry with yours truly for scale.
http://twitpic.com/tlyu - Standing at the edge of this below ground missile silo *is* surreal and spikes my adrenaline.
